Title: TFS Backlog Manager
Description:
TFS Backlog Manager is an easy way to view and edit the backlog of work-items, in a way similar to the Scrumworks two panel setup.

On the left are the committed work items for the selected sprints.
On the right are the uncommitted backlog work items.
You drag-and-drop work items between the two columns to fill up the sprints with work. 
Selecting an work item will display more details and allow editing the work item.

It's done in C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
TFS Backlog Manager is an easy way to view and edit the backlog of work-items, in a way similar to the Scrumworks two panel setup.

On the left are the committed work items for the selected sprints.
On the right are the uncommitted backlog work items.
You drag-and-drop work items between the two columns to fill up the sprints with work.
Selecting an work item will display more details and allow editing the work item.

It's done in C# and WPF.


On the shoulders of giants

  • Gong Drag+Drop - simplify drag+drop handling
  • Extended WPF Toolkit - number edit fields with up/down spinners
  • PostSharp - never again implement INotifyPropertyChanged
  • Command line arguments - because some things don't just work
